node.title: Which bad behaviour most deserves an electric shock?
node.author: talexb

data.field: Posting code without code tags Putting 'urgent' into the title of a node Ignoring the fine manual Using [wp://lolspeak] in a post Posting the same question multiple times Asking monks in the Chatterbox to answer their question posted to [SoPW] Complaining about the performance of the site Making suggestions to change the XP system Using Cowboy Neal's name in vain Other
